snippet.title: QR DEAD - First Trailer. (Official Video).
snippet.description:
The Game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3291130/QR_DEAD

Your phone is the key to solving the mystery. Scan QR codes, they hold hidden clues. Find herbs for the infusion to save your grandfather. But be careful. A fog has engulfed the village, and a monster with a crossbow for a hand roams within. You are only safe at the altar. Why is it chasing you? 

Social media:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/beshbarmak_games
X - https://x.com/Beshbarmakgames
Telegram - https://t.me/beshbarmakgames

#QRDEAD #QR_DEAD #beshbarmakgames
